alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 5:34PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Bradford County through 615 PM EST... At 533 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mansfield, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sayre, Athens, Canton, West Franklin, Troy, Sheshequin, Ulster, Springfield, West Burlington and Monroe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
